onDidSaveTextDocument1:
File was saved -- determining whether the file is a USS file or Data set.
 Comparing (case insensitive)
activate.didSaveText.isDataSet: File is a data set-- saving

watchConfigProfile.theia: Team config file watcher is disabled in Theia environment.
